body.p: This element is used for holding a set of read-only views of Web documents. It is similar to the template.XULElem("browser") element, except that multiple documents can be displayed, each in a separate tab.

p.span: template.Note("Starting in Firefox 3 (XULRunner/Gecko 1.9), this is only used in the main Firefox window and cannot be used in other XUL windows by third-party applications or extensions.")
